name: routing-js
description: Library for consistent access to various vehicle routing APIs

scripts.prepare_containers: docker run -dt --name graphhopper-tests -p 8989:8989 -v $PWD/test_data:/graphhopper/data israelhikingmap/graphhopper:latest -i data/andorra-latest.osm.pbf --host 0.0.0.0 && docker run -dt --name osrm-tests -p 5000:5000 -v $PWD/test_data:/data osrm/osrm-backend:latest osrm-routed --algorithm=MLD /data/andorra-latest.osrm && docker run -dt --name valhalla-tests -p 8002:8002 -v $PWD/test_data:/custom_files -e tileset_name=andorra-tiles -e use_tiles_ignore_pbf=True gisops/valhalla:latest
scripts.destroy_containers: docker stop graphhopper-tests && docker rm graphhopper-tests && docker stop osrm-tests && docker rm osrm-tests && docker stop valhalla-tests && docker rm valhalla-tests

author: Christian Beiwinkel <christian@gis-ops.com>
